content.detailedDescription: Me and two other friends were all watching the full moon cycle which was remarkable in itself, at roughly about three thrity am, the stars were fully out and we were in an area where there were no nearby lights, so there was a very clear view of the sky and the first ufo we saw was very far out and was traveling extreamly fast it was glowing all kinds of colors as it passed quickly through. we saw at least 10 different ufo's during this particular phase of the moon when it became fully darkened by some sort of lunar eclipse and the sky was extreamly clear to see all the stars.Each ufo we saw was star like, some traveling fast  all were headed in a single straight line, never making any manuvers, some dissappeared as we watched others continued on their own little routes to wherever. the one that really caught everyons attention was just like the others, but seemed to be traveling toward our direction, it was coming along and just flared up firey orangish reddish color very bright, enough to make all of us go "whoah" then quickly switched directions, and go back the way it came, glittering as it went. we kept seeing these little stars, some closer than others, all traveling on a single line course, we werent sure if these could be satallites or not, we saw ten or more of these. none close enough to get a good description of the shape of the ufo, but all equally spectacular in itself. the spectical continued until the sun began to rise and the stars faded, and we all felt extreamy lucky to have witnessed all this activity that went on during this three hour period of time..
content.summary: We saw at least 12 different ufo's all very far out in space each flying at different speeds in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: i was out watching the eclipse all night in my own yard out in the country .. -nothing fancy.  i thought i was looking at stars they were still fixed objects  then they started moving across the sky white in color  weird smooth  movement  i watched them as they left out of my view this is 4 seperate lights not a formation  4 separate events within 30 minutes one grew brighter and then moved across the sky till it was gone. all objects started out as stationary with no movement . as i said  i thought i was looking at bright stars. it made my hair stand up on my body. just absolutey fascinating. i have made a report of my sighting in january 2007. i thought i should also report this. people have got to learn to get out and see this stuff for themselves. it's unbelievable what is going on in our skies.
content.summary: I thought i was looking at stars they were stable white then all the sudden they  started moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Could see lights in various locations around moon, they would move at incredible speed left to right up and down. stopping at times then zooming up at unbelievable speed to about over head.Approx. distance was about two spans in about 5 seconds. i was mesmerized and thinking how lucky i am to be seeing this. if anyone else saw this they would surely believe there is something out there. i looked in diff. parts of the sky during this event and saw nothing moving in order to confirm to me what i saw. "wow", a once in a life time sighting. has anyone else contacted you about this? i am not an idiot what so ever, what i saw ways real.There is no doubt in my mind i could possibly be wrong.I thought maybe there were some sat. placed to photo the eclipse until they started moving at right angles and stopping then moving again sometimes in diff. directions. i lost sight of the event when a fog bank started to move in the area.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights moving in 90 degree angles around the moon during eclipse

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened two years ago, but i will render it to the best of my memory's ability.

it was july 2005, 2 days before my 21st birthday.  i was staying at a friends trailer off baseline rd. in boulder, co  we (my friend, i, and another acquaintance) were all drinking that night.  we were bored and decided to go camping.  my buddy had everything we needed already so we loaded up his pickup and headed out to nederland, co via hwy 119.  my friend said he knew a good spot, that's why we went to nederland, but when we got there, he couldn't find it.  we ended up taking a road into the mountains, looking for a suitable camping spot.  about 2-4 miles outside of nederland we found a spot, it was dark but we set up the tent (took about an hour to do)  and started a small campfire. we talked and cooked something on the fire (hot dogs, brats, something of that nature) for a few hours.  i remember my buddy telling me something about satanic cults in this part of colorado that have shrines or whatever in the woods.  then the other guy with us said something like "holy shit!, look! look at that!" he pointed to a bright sphere in the sky.  it was about 3:00am when i saw it, it was very bright and seemed to have 2 colors present, white light, and a red or purple.  the next thing i knew we were all sitting around the campfire as before.  i felt very tired all of the sudden, i looked at my watch and it was 6 something am.  i felt dumbfounded, it seemed like i just checked my watch and it was ~2:50am.  i went to bed.  the next morning we discussed it, none knew what really happened, none could explain the missing 3-something hours.  we all knew we had witnessed something out of this world.

in the weeks after the event i must have gone over it in my mind a million times.  i couldn't find any answers, and i put it out of my mind.  it's only recently that i've been researching what happened that night to a large extent.  i believe my companions and i were abducted by aliens.  i am considering undergoing hypnosis to retrieve the memories, but i'm not sure i want them.  i have since lost touch with the other two men there tonight and have tried in vain to contact them.
content.summary: Ufo encounter while camping, missing time

content.detailedDescription:
It has taken me a while to find this site so i can report exactly what i observed, it un-nerved me to say the least. the time was approximately 04:20 am i was collecting my partner from his home in golden, to begin our shift duties, there was very little light pollution up by the foothills and it was a very quiet night, while i was waiting for him to come out i was sitting on the hood of my car gazing across the foothills
when i noticed what appeared to be a very bright spot light flying over the top of the mountainside, it was illuminating the foothills as it went, 
it was coming in my direction almost over head, there were no strobes or colored lights as usually seen on aircraft, it was totally silent, as it approached my position, i drew a small but very powerful flash light from my duty rig, i flashed a series of about 4 signals, the object stopped above me, it was the size of a 10 cent coin, it just looked like a spot light, at this point i was feeling more than a little intimidated, and i inadvertently let my hand rest on my duty weapon, and the thought was i could if need be, engage this object if it moved any closer to me,
just as  had this thought, i observed without even blinking an eye, the object accelerate straight up at an immeasurable rate of speed until it reached infinity and totally disappeared, i was more than a little concerned about the sighting, i passed this information to my partner but he just discounted it as my imagination! i have never officially reported this to any one else
content.summary: Ufo seen over foothills of golden colorado

content.detailedDescription:
1.)  in my backyard in south san jose near highways 85 and 87 at approximately 1:00am sunday morning.  i was stargazing.

2.)  i was already looking up at the night sky.

3.)  at first i thought it was a flashlight or searchlight coming across the bottom of the cloud, but then i realized there was no beam coming from the ground upwards, and that the "light" remained just as bright even when it passed through the cloudless part of the night sky.

4.)  i was amazed i could not see any physical object as i could see clouds and stars "through" it, as though it was invisible except for it's vapor trail.

5.)  it moved very seiftly across the sky.  there was no sound like from a plane or helicopter, and it was not like a solid ball of light as you might expect from a comet or meteorite.

6.)  it eventually seemed to disappear into the clouds where i lost track of it.
content.summary: Witness discribed a "wierd illuminated trail", but definitely not an aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
1.)  in my back yard in south san jose near highways 85 and 87.  at approximately 1:00am sunday morning i was stargazing.

2.)  i was already looking up at the night sky.

3.)  at first i thought it was a flashlight or searchlight moving across the bottom of the cloud, but then i realized there was no beam coming from the ground upwards, and that the "light" remained just as bright even when it passed through the cloudless part of the night sky.

4.)  i was amazed i could not see any physical object as i could see clouds and stars "through" it, as though it was invisible except for it's vapor trail.

5.)  it moved very swiftly across the sky.  there was no sound like from a plane or helicopter and it was not like a solid ball of light as you might expect from a comet or meteorite.  it remained a constant speed, size and intensity.

6.)  it eventually seemed to disappear into the clouds where i lost track of it.
content.summary: Witness discribed a "wierd illuminated trail', but definately not an aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Please go to google earth and zoom in on 70, 24, 52.16n; 40, 11, 55.67w and secondary target at 72, 59, 50.23n; 46, 44, 56.59w.  i would appreciate your comments on the oject protruding from the ice.
content.summary: Object prodtruding from ice

content.detailedDescription:
i was watching a late movie and the power went out so i went outside to see if other houses had lost power (they had) and let my dog relieve herself.  it was predawn and it was partly cloudy. i saw a golden orange light that i thought might be a police helicopter searchlight moving in from the se but the light was too large and the wrong color and there was no sound or other running lights.  the light moved rapidly up and diminished to a size slightly larger than jupitor or venus entering and exiting the clouds.  it seemed to stop relative to my hand(the clouds were moving) for 4 to 5 seconds at one point and then moved higher and to the n-nw overhead to diminish until gone in a clear area of sky. 
 the only possible thing i thought it might be was a light fastened to a balloon though some of the movements appeared to go against the wind and it moved rapidly up rather than across the sky as balloons usually do when caught by upper level winds. i felt the light was eerie and was strangly thrilled when seeing it.
 it did come from the direction of davis/monthan air force base, though.
 the date is approxmate but i know it was a friday night/saturday morning and the time is nearly correct as there was a power outage and the clocks were stopped at that time. incidently, the power came on about a 10 seconds after i lost sight of the object.  my girlfriend saw the light once it was higher in the sky until it faded from view overhead.  
 last month she had gone outside and saw two stationary "stars" suddenly move around each other as if "they were on a tether" and then move away in opposite directions.  she called me outside and i only saw two lights like satellites moving in opposite directions, but i don't think they or airplanes can move like she described. odd.
content.summary: A gold/orange light moved from low in the se to high and overhead

content.detailedDescription: Noticed nothing out of the ordinary other than the dark cloud. photograph was taken facing ne
content.summary: I was taking photos from my sisters home just prior to a lightning storm

content.detailedDescription: It wa approximatly 2;30 am on the 26th of august,i had came outside ,my home to exercise my dogs and was looking at the stars, when i noticed, what appeared to be a satillite traveling fast from the northwest, just above that horizon to the southeast.I was facing east and as it approached my approximate "two o`clock positin" nearing the southeast horizon, it abruptly mad a "90-degree" turn to the east and then deminished from my sight. and as we all know, satilites , don`t change coarse !
content.summary: Appeared to be a satillite moving at a fast rate, from sw to ne,however, it made a sudden 90 degree turn at my two-o`clock towards the east.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was actually noticed first on the evening of august 22, 2007.  while examining the sky at aroun 9:30 pm, i noticed a star like object moving from the north west location to the north east location.  this start like object was low in the skyline, above the horizon.  while i visually tracked this light, which became very bright, was moving very fast and seemed to come from nowhere, another identiacl light appeared behind the initial sighting.  both of these objects became very bright then the first object started dimming then eventually dissapeared.  the second object that was directly behind it, also began to dim then eventually dissapeared.

on august 27th at around 9:45 in the evening.  i noticed a star like object  coming from the north west moving to the south.  this object became very bright, was moving very fast and soon after it became very bright, a second object, identical in path and speed, appeared as well.  both of these objects were visible for approzimately five minutes before the first object began dimming then completely dissapeared.  the second object then dimmed and dissapeared as well.  

i do not believe these were satellites or space debris as i have noticed these many times in the night sky.  these two sightings on two separate occasions moved with purpose, were in a "follow the leader" formation and were very close in proximity to each other.
content.summary: Star like objects in formation

content.detailedDescription: I returned home from work in june of 2003, i always got home at approximately the same time (6 pm to 6:10 pm).  eric, our gray cat, was at the back door wanting to go outside.  my next recollection was standing at the back door holding the door open and looking up.  the first thing that caught my attention was what appeared to be some sort of pipes connected to a large metal craft hoovering above my head, it was approximately 10 feet above a mermosia tree (approximately 20 feet tall), part of the craft was hoovering over the house and about 2/3rds was over the back yard, with the nose (the skinnist part of the triangle was over sons room facing west).  i heard no noise for what seemed like 3 minutes, however, was probably seconds.  the craft then emited a very low hum, almost inaudible, and slowly moved away to the west.  as the craft drew away from me i saw a grid like structure along the entire back (the flat part of the triangle if you had it pointed away from you) which glowed, but i felt no heat.  it got approximately three houses away, accellerated and was gone.  i glanced around and that is when i noticed that it was dusk.  dusk in june in new mexico is close to 9 pm.
content.summary: Approx 50 ft long, 40 ft wide at widest point. low low hum when in motion, subdued glow from rear of craft, hovered, moved at great speed

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sirs: 

my eye caught the following article while surfing the web today.  
 
ufo researchers seek 'the truth' 
 
http://news.Yahoo.Com/s/space/uforesearchersseekthetruth;_ylt=a0wtuedosnfg1t8aab8plbif
 
if you are seeking the truth about ufo's here it is:
 
i am writing to tell you my eyewitness experience of seeing the phoenix lights.  i was driving west on mcdowell road coming over the hills where the road goes by papago park in phoenix, az.  it was early evening, and visibility was excellent as the city throws off so much light.  as i came over the hills i saw them.  at first i thought it was a plane, because like many witnesses said, it was flying in a v formation.  i thought it was odd because it was flying so low and that something was not right for the plane to be flying that close to the ground in the city.  on closer inspection, you could see the v was not perfectly formed like it would have been if the lights had been on the edges of wings.  more importantly, there was nothing material around the lights.  i could see this plainly, and i could see this clearly.  it was more like an uneven formation of flying birds - only in this case lights. you could see different lights from different angles and the same lights from different angles as they flew overhead, and there was nothing material around any of them. many people thought it was a giant flying triangular shaped object because they assumed there was something behind the lights which there wasn't.  whether it was alien or governmental research craft i do not know.  but i do know they were not conventional aircraft of any kind.  the lights were low enough and traveling slow enough that i could have seen any solid objects.  they were traveling too slowly to be conventional aircraft.  if they had been aircraft they would have had to be outfitted with a globular light around the whole craft and then they could not fly if surrounded by a sphere.  the lights did not even look big enough to contain either a comercial or private plane in them. i watched it for several minutes and continued driving on my way.
 
i think that if some craft are composed of energy, that could explain their ability to change direction suddenly if they had no mass.  also, if they had no mass and could travel at the speed of light, that would explain there ability to "appear" and "disappear":  if they shifted to that speed, they could leave your field of vision so quickly that you could simply could not follow them although an alternative possibility is that they have inter dimensional travel.
 
sincerely,
richard a. wolfe
content.summary: I am an eyewitness to the phoenix lights - a v shaped formation of lights with no apparent material objects involved.

content.detailedDescription: I saw it when i was at the beach
content.summary: Different shapes,very high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were sitting outside on the front steps, facing south.  the moon was to the left more, so it was kind of at a south east placement.  it was heat lightning in the direction behind us.  there were clouds going past the moon at a steady pace.  there was something that went past it really fast.  it was long and skinny, like a cigar.  it was going much faster than the clouds.  they had a regular pace, the entire duration of us watching the moon.  assuming it was just my imagination i said nothing.  my friend declared "whoah!!! did you see that?!!?" and i said, "yeah.  i thought i imagined it."  we continued staring at the moon for quite some time, waiting to see if we could see it again.  
my initial thought after seeing it was this episode of "wren and stimpy" i saw when i was little, about the yak that paddles in a conoe past the moon. then my friend proceeded to call it the dragon from neverending story.  after all the guessing and jokes, we remained outside for about an hour and never saw anything again.
content.summary: It was a cigar shaped thing that went past the moon faster than all the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting on a metro bus around 9pm saturday,i looked to the south were the bus would be approaching from and i saw a stationary object that was very bright and looked like a meteorite due to  some sort of discharge coming from the back. to the right of the object appeared 2 lights that at that time looked like stars, this portion lasting maybe 10 seconds before the other two star like lights blossomed instantly into the same type of looking meteorite as the first. then they started (swimming) around at very low speeds emitting or dropping lighting or sparks, not at a constant just here and there. the would fly around at one point what really got me was 2 were approaching from the east at different angles the first one ii saw was coming from atop of the others on a collision course with on of the ones coming from the east and when the one from the east going west past underneath the one coming from above the one from above did a loop to reposotion itself ending behind.At all times the looked like falling meteorites but descending at controlled speeds, but doing zigzag and loop manuvers. what i thoufgt was cool was the sparks or whatever that would sometimes be discharged. well after a couple of minutes 2 of them faded to lights and were gone the 3 original stayed about another minute just flying slowly around and it to turned to just a light and it was gone. i would sayed at arms length, they were deffinitely at least the size of a green pea. approx. at my best guess 3-5 miles away.
 i have always beleived in ufos and did see a daylight sighting in houston about 10 yrs ago that i reported to you at mufon.
 those things that i watched had my jaw dropped, and my jaw stayed dropped for several minutes after the sighting was gone just puzzled, amazed, and excited. i am now going to look in todays sunday paper and see if there is anything in there about strange lights in the sky reported by others.
thanks
content.summary: 3 objects coming in at diff. angles controlled speed looking like metorites with tails, dropping spark,electrical discharge

content.detailedDescription:
When leaving friends house, we observed 2 no. lights in the sky, over the river clyde at approx. 200 - 400 feet in the air. at this time it was nearing dark, and conditions were good. the first star like object was observed first and appeared to be closer than the other one. at first i assumed it was a helecopter or small plane, however as the object got nearer there was no sound of an engine or distunguishing of any aircraft tail lights etc. the objects appeared to move unlike any conventional aircraft, at a slow - medium speed- then stationary as if observing. the first object moved into the distance then remained stationary as if a star in the sky. the second object which was closer than the first appeared to take the form of a hot air baloon on closer inspection, however this object was no longer visible in the sky when when distracted for a small period of time, approx. 5mins. the first of the two objects that was originally observed was still in the sky but now at a greater distance away, the second 'air baloon' object was no where to be seen.
note these objects were observed in the sky above the river clyde. i was drinking that night with friends (but not intoxicated) as it was the 'highland games' so there were many people, who would also have witnessed these lights. friends with me at the time also witnessed these lights and also found then to be very peculiar.
content.summary: 2 no. ufo's observed, 1 star like, other appeared star like, then appeared to change shape to what looked like a hot air baloon.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: sandia mountains, begenning of may 2005, approximate hour: between 11:00 am and 1:00 pm. 
returning from a climb in the sandia mountains, albuquerque.

we were returning from a climb in the sandia mountain and when arriving in the foothills of the mountaina i decided to take a panoramic picture of the sandias. at that time i was not looking at the sky. i took a first picture of the mountains to the north west then, 9s later i took another picture of the mountains toward a summit called south-peak. i did not notice anything because i was looking at the mountain and not at the sky.

i didn't look at my picture before i was back in france were i was living at that time. since 2002, i use to spend vacation in albuquerque were i have friends who are mountains lovers and hikers and good climbers. 

when i looked at the sandia mountains pictures, i noticed on one of them a small spot. i magnified the picture (1600x1200pixels)and realized that there was some kind of blue-grey rectangle centered in the upper part of the picture. my first reaction was to consider it as a speckle, this kind of electronic parasites you got sometimes on digital picture. however when magnifying the picture, it seemed that the rectangle had some kind of thickness. then as the sandia laboratories are very close from the sandia mountains, in fact they are located just behind the airport, south of the sandias and close to the manzano mountains, i came to the point that it might be the result of a laser projection test. knowing that the laboratories might be working on high power laser (some of the seniors hikers of the mountain club were former scientists at the laboratory)i thought it could be a reasonnable answer. but another option came to my mind regarding the inversion of temperature well known in this part of albuquerque and that could lead to some weather phenomena...

so far i don't have a real idea of what this blue-grey rectangle could have been. but i remember another rectangle seen high in the sky of paris
in winter time and that was following a straight path over the house,until i lost it. the celling was cloudy and high and the rectangle was under it. this was at my sister's home and my brother in law concluded that it was probably a sheet of metal or other material flying in the air carried away by the wind; the weather was actually a stormy weather but it was not raining. i had another sighting experience in the sixtees, i was i think in my fifties: spheric and metallic object, no noise, low altitude, took elevation. no wind. other witnesses considered the object being a balloon.

attached are the picture of the sighting (029), and the picture (028) took 9 seconds before. no picture of the mountains was taken after that.
content.summary: Rectangular shaped object caught on a digital camera.

content.detailedDescription: On my 7th birthday i was living in a place called takilma oregon it is a small valley only a couple miles wide on the oregon california border about 50 miles inland from ocean. it was almost every night during the summer of 1968 and 1969 we would see theses ships sitting up on the ridge in the treeline at least 2 - 5 ships almost every night as a child i didnt know it was abnormal as all the people i was with were into the hippy thing so it was never scary to me . on the night i saw one it was sitting up on the ridge about 2 miles from me and i was riding my bike up the road with a woman who was with me we had left a party and i was riding her home on my new bike. all of the sudden one of the ufos does like a l shaped approach it comes off the mou8ntain and down into the valley and comes right up to us. it sits there hovering above our head for about 15-30 seconds. and then it retraces its path in an l shape backward and to the side and goes back up on the ridge line and sits with the other ships there i want to say there was about 4-6 ships there that night. i have never forgotten this incident and it was a nightly occurance to see these ships everynight all summer long they would sit and watch us . and we would watch them as far as i know we were never harmed although i sometimes wonder if they did do something to us . i never have felt normal like i fitted in with society. but thats my account of the event as i saw it from the eyes of a 7 year old oh its measurement was approx 50-75 feet around and to me it was a big circular globe that had the same irridecense as the moon it glowed bright white like the moon no flashing lights no windows just bright white balloon perfect circle and it was fast it moved 2-4 miles in a matter of 3 seconds. i am willing to talk to anyone about this so feel free to ask me anything. thanks for letting me share my interaction with you. i was elated after it came and looked at us i felt like it was saying hello . i never felt to scared i mean im sure i was but it wasnt a really like screaming crying thing it only lasted a second and it was more like i was in awe
content.summary: Ufo came across the valley and stopped about 100 ft from us

content.detailedDescription:
I had driven up and parked at milepost 418/east fork of the pigeon river overlook on the blue ridge parkway to see if i could catch the last few perseid meteors.  i was facing n/ne.  my view was approx 180 degrees.  big dipper was on my far left.  cassiopeia/perseus slight left in my field of view.  arrived approx 8:30 p.M.  caught the last part of sunset and the stars came out.  weather was mild and a clear, cloudless summer evening.  lots of air traffic, all planes, etc. had lights that blink either white or with red lights.

event began about 9:40 p.M.  had seen approx 3 perseid meteors (2 quickies, 1 earth-grazer with nice tail.)  approx. 3 satellites, and many airplanes.

two lights caught my eye to my left from low in the horizon at the bottom of the big dipper.  the lights were star-like but much brighter than any other object in the sky at the time.  i thought the lights were possibly air traffic initially, i kept waiting to see the blinking red or white lights that planes exhibit.  no lights ever flashed from these objects.  they moved very slowly across the sky.  they stayed low in my line of sight, moving from left to right across my line of sight from big dipper through the top edge of perseus, etc.  as the lights moved out of the big dipper, they changed position from one above the other (about four fingers width at arms lenght) to one leading and one following directly behind.  

it was very quiet that night, little wind, sound of the falls clearly heard down below.  sounds of jets and other air traffic clearly heard.  that is what got my attention initially.  these objects made no sound, did not have safety lights flashing, and were not following the air traffic pattern i had observed to that point that night going into and out of the avl airport.  also they seemed to move with a deliberate slowness.

the two moved slowly and i felt they slowed even more as i became aware of them, as if they were deliberately trying to engage my senses.  i felt my adrenaline response (fight or flight) surge.  the objects seemed to challenge me in a menacing way.  i am a born-again christian and while beleiving of course in the supernatural, i also fear nothing of satan and his demons.  i do believe that people do see ufos, ghosts, etc. but that they are simply a deceptive tool used by satan to confuse and ensare the unsaved.  i beleieve this ufo deception will play a key role very soon in world affairs.

in any event, i felt a surge of courage and boldness from the holy spirit within to challenge these lights with the truth of jesus.  i shouted out to the lights that i did not fear them, that they had control over me, that jesus would return soon to establish his kingdom forever, that they (the demonic spirits) would be thrown in the lake of fire soon, and that i was commanding them in strenghth through the lord jesus that they be gone immediately so they may not decieve anyone else skywatching that night.

strangely or appropriately enough depending on your view, the lights faded in strength for about 5 seconds and then promptly dissapeared/dissolved  and did not return for the rest of the time i stayed at the overlook that night when i left at approx. 11:30 p.M.

i felt invigorated by the experience but also needed to calm down a bit too.  i have never in 15 years of a christian walk ever felt like i was directly involved in any kind of "spiritual warfare" kind of event.  i was joyful because the holy spirit gave me strenght, calm, courage, and boldness to stand up to ufo forces that often fill people with dread, uncertainty, fear, and anxiety.  the fact that they disappeared from the sky at my command through the lord's power was amazing, but on the other hand i expected to be victorious over the powers/lights of demonic ufo deception the moment i spoke commanding them to be gone form their deceptive mission that night.

it was an unusual evening.  i have spent at least 3-4 nights per week star-gazing on the brp and at max patch since june 2007 and have seen my share of meteors, satellites, airplanes, jets, props, helis, etc.  i know every microwave tower, cell tower, etc. from the overlooks that i frequent.  the lights/ufos that i saw wednesday were like nothing i have seen.  they were not flashy, hollywood-style ufos.  in fact, most of the jets and other air traffic that night had much more in the way of speed/flashing lights, etc. than the two ufo lights that i saw.  the main thing was that they slowed down intentionally to me, almost flaunting themselves to challenge my rational notions.  they seemed to consciously challenege me mentally.  there were no voices in my head or that were audible, but there was a definite menancing challenge and hubris to the ufo lights toward me.  it was as if they had other plans and people to go out and decieve, and they hadn't counted on me seeing them any more than i had expected to see them when i drove up that night.  it was like two thieves casing a house or something and i was the law enforcement that stumbled in on a criminal act.  we each faced each other down, but my authority given through jesus made them flee at my command.  that part of the whole experience (which lasted no more than 4 minutes) was the most uncanny feeling; the ufo lights dissolved at my command, not before, not after, but at exactly after i commanded the lights to be gone, they immediateley dissolved.
content.summary: 2 ufos fly past brp overlook

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the sunrise.  the object was not visible as i took pictures, it appeared in the picture when i viewed it in the camera and in a picture file.
content.summary: See attached picture

content.detailedDescription:
I am a homeless laborer who found work on a boston construction site, but had no place to stay. one of my coworkers, frank, took me to spend the night at a local shantytown. while being shown around that night, i noticed some odd behavior at a small church across the street. investigating the next day, i discovered that the soup kitchen they were operating was a sham. the choir practice was a recording, scientific apparatus and stacks of cardboard boxes were scattered around the rear areas of the building, and i accidentally stumbled on several more boxes hidden in a secret compartment in a wall.

that night the police surrounded the church, forcing the inhabitants to flee. the police then turned on the shantytown, destroying it with bulldozers and beating the blind minister of the church. i returned to the site the next day and decided to investigate the church again, which had been emptied. i took one of the boxes from the secret compartment and 
opened it in an alleyway, finding it full of sunglasses. i decided to keep one pair and leave the rest in a garbage can.

when i later donned the glasses for the first time, i noticed that a billboard now simply displayed the word "obey," while another billboard urged the viewer to "marry and reproduce." i also saw that paper money bears the words "this is your god." all printed matter around me contained subliminal advertising.

additionally i soon discovered that many people are actually aliens. when they realized that i can see them for what they are, the police suddenly arrived. i escaped and stole their shotgun, and went on a shooting spree at a local bank, which was filled with the aliens. one saw me and disappeared after twisting a dial on his wristwatch.

escaping the bank, i returned to the construction site to talk over what i had discovered with frank. viewing me as a wanted man for the shooting spree, he was initially uninterested in my story. we had a fight as i attempted to convince him and then force him to put on the sunglasses. when he did, he joined me and we got in contact with the group from the church. we heard that a meeting was being held at a local community center later that day.

at the meeting we learned that the alien's primary method of control is a signal being sent out on television, which is why the general public cannot see the aliens for what they are. the glasses, now available in contact lens form, interfere with the signal. 

the meeting was raided by the police, who this time shoot to kill. escaping the battle with the help of one of the wrist devices, we found ourselves in an unknown building where the aliens were throwing a party for their human collaborators.

the building turned out to be the basement of a local tv station and the source of the alien's signal. i am going to attempt to destroy the broadcasting antenna, and hopefully not get killed in the process.
content.summary: Aliens are lliving among us

content.detailedDescription: On saturday the 4 of august 2007 my wife and i where working on our yard her tending the flowers i the lawn and trees.About 1:30 pm i was on the noth/west side of the house when my  wife came w/a  glass of lemonade,and we took a break, and started to admire some cloud formations,and tried to find figures in them,(this is our personal game when we travel) also we notice at least six airplanes lining up heading west  to lax for landing,some times we see up to nine, all of a sudden from behind a cloud above us, we noticed a metalic silver sphere it was way up cant say how high but it was up there just floathing, i streched my arm and placed nine of my fingers together above the plane flying over us ,when  the sphere was above the plane,it looked as big as the tail end of the plane,this lasted about a minute and a half,i ran inside to grab my camera when i came back about forty five seconds later,the sphere was shining like a light bulb,just when i turned my camera on and tried to focus ,it moved so fast in a north/ east direction and dissapeared,by the way it came from the west/ and stood there when first seen,it was a sunny hot day and a few white clouds in the beautiful blue sky , i was exited,so was my wife for i had told her that i had seen a  gold colored sphere a few moths back when i was at work in the city of downey about five miles from where we live,this time the two of us got to share this sigthing,this was the fourth or fifth for my wife and the ten plus for me. we have seen the normal cigar ,saucer,a couple of strange shapes , the famous black helicopters with no markings just a red light on the bottom, small super fast  lighted objects about the size of a humming bird ,a meteor looked so big ten or more times the size of what is normaly seen, and now the spheres i wish someone will be able to explain all this some day ,while this happens we will continue to glance at the sky whenever possible.Thank you for your time,
content.summary: Bright metalic sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was living on a farm in kansas, with my parents,brothers and sisters and was around 14 or 15. i am 57 now. i got angry at my parents because they would not let me go to town. i walked back about 300 yards into the pasture and sat down next to a little pot hole where they dug a whole for coal testing. it was just now getting dark and i could see the stars. i was sitting north and looking at the north star when suddenly i noticed it moving and coming tuwards me and getting closer. i remember thinking that it wasn't the north star, it was something else, and it was getting closer to me by the minute. i watched it for about 10 minutes and it was about a quarter of a mile from me and about a thousand feet above the ground. then instead of seeing one lighted object, three lights came on. two, as if they were on the end of wings and one as if at the end of a tail of a plane. and it even sounded like an airplane. i thought then that it was just an airplane, but it kept getting closer. the next thing i know it was hovering over my head about 10 ft above me. the plane looking lights went off and then there were differant colored lights blinking off and on in a circuler manner. it was saucer shaped. i got up and started to run and run right into a patch of sticker bushes. so i stoped and looked up and it was still above me. then a white light shined on me starting from a small hole and growing bigger. i was now standing in a really bright light about 10 ft in diameter. the next thing i remember the light closed up and the craft started to rise higher until it was about a thousand feet off the ground. i noticed i was not standing where i was when the light started to shine on me. the crafts plane light came back on and it sounded like and airplane again. it went due south for about a quarter of a mile and turned 90 degrees towards the east, then went about 300 yards and turned north at a 90. i was then trying to hide behind a tree and shaking like a scared rabbit. when it got back to where it was almost even with me it took offfaster than anything i have ever seen and left a pure white trail clear up to the end of the atmospher. the people that i have told besides my family, you can count on one hand and they told me after i told my story that they new it was true just by how excited i got when i told it. i didn't tell anyone for about ten years after because i thought they would come back and get me. i'm at the age now that i would almost invite them to come and get me and take me for a ride in space. well, not almost, if they were friendly i would go in a heart beat. i have always wanted to get hypnotized to see what happened from the time the light shined around me and the time it closed up. i am not possitive but i think there was a couple of hours missing in there too. i would also like to see if there was anything planted in me. that is my story and i swear to god it is the truth....Doug...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A saucer shaped object came down out of the sky and hovered above me

content.detailedDescription: This is an old report that occurred months before ufos were even talked about, during the spring of, i think, 1947.  i was a young boy walking home from school with four young friends, along a lonely street on the edge of sydney, nova scotia.  suddenly one of my friends pointed to the sky directly overhead, to a very bright dot.  we all marveled at how bright it was, and reasoned that it must have been a balloon with the sun shining on it.  this was about 4:00 in the afternoon and the sky was partially cloudy.  since my friends thought they had it figured out they did not give it much further attention and walked off, but to me it was too bright to be a balloon and i kept staring at it, alone.  then i noticed that this bright dot was sitting in the middle of a very large, circular hole in the clouds.  moving clouds would approach the perimeter of this circle and drift around it.  the inside of the circle was not at all ragged, as one would expect with clouds.  my neck was getting kinked, as the bright dot was directly overhead, and i reasoned there was nothing i could do about it, so i walked a few steps forward with my attention on where i was going but could not resist a look up again.  the bright dot was then gone, and the circle of clouds was just beginning to close in.  months later reports of ufos appeared, and i put the two together but mentioned my thoughts to no one.  mine is the only case i know of where a ufo was seen influencing a second object, the clouds.  no conventional phenomena can explain that in a form so perfect.
content.summary: Bright dot

content.detailedDescription: Was on my patio and looking at stars and noticed a triangular formation of stars..Then one of the lights/stars started moving i thought at first maybe a satalite but then it continued to move very fast up and away in a southeast angle until it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright star like light moving very fast up and away and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a photo of a ufo i took at mt. washington in june while standing at the western edge of the parking lot at the visitor's center where the "mt. washington auto road" to the top of the mountain begins. i was taking pictures of the mountains to the west of where i was standing when i noticed this distant object flying around erratically and i attempted to get a couple of shots of it. after i took the photos i completely forgot about them because at the time i didn't have any thought of a ufo on my mind. it was too distant and it appeared to be something like a bouquet of mylar balloons getting blown in the wind in a sort of counter-clockwise rolling motion. i didn't load or look at any of my vacation photos in my notebook pc until returned to maine again in early august. when i got to look at the one that contains the object, i suddenly remembered why i took the shot and zoomed in on it to see if i could make out what it was i had seen. imagine my surprise. 
when i looked at the second photo, which was taken 3 seconds later, there was no object that appears anywhere in the frame. 
i was using a canon powershot a540, without the zoom on, and was holding it at about a foot in front of my face. i have no idea where the object went after the first shot was taken. 
i would say that the ridge in the foreground, just below the object, was about 2/5 of a mile away from where i was standing and that the object was much further away than i had intitially thought when i took the photo, possibly a mile from where i was. i would put it's size at about 35-50 feet in diameter. i also noticed when i zoom in on the object in the photo, there appears to be some sort of vertical rod on the top of it. others i've shown the photo to, have said the same thing.
the whole time frame of my sighting lasted about ten seconds from when i first spotted it, took the two photos, and was no longer able to see it. 
my son and his girlfriend where in the same parking lot, but where about 100 feet from where i was. the sighting didn't excite me and i didn't even mention it to them. as i said, it was distant and it never struck me at the time as possibly being a ufo. who would have thought they'd ever be presented with the opportunity to get a shot of one in their lifetime? i took the photos as a curiosity.
content.summary: Ufo near entrance of mt. washington auto road in new hampshire

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car i looked to the right and i seen what i thought was some sort of firework but i didnt hear anything it was shaped like a u but filled in at the top it was florescent green with a white light inside of it i am not sure if there was a tail but it almost looked like something was in front of it rather than behind it it was 60 ft in the air right above the tree line there was a plane flying behind it to the north this object i seen in the east this is definately something i have seen many meteors and shooting stars they are no where near as big as this but it seemed to move as fast as a shooting star the colors around it looked a greenish color like some of the shooting stars i have seen before but this object is huge compared to any meteors i have ever seen if the object was arms length it would be the sixe of a cereal box i cant tell how far it was but it looked as though it was 60 feet high right above the tree lines again i was sitting in my car i leaned over looked out the passenger door i just happened to look over when i seen this object the plane that was passing by could have caught it on radar i dont know i was freaked out by this i look at the night sky alot i know the differnce between any planes, meteors, satelites i know this was either a large meteor or a ufo being that it was florescent green and a u shape i can honestly say it probally wasnt a meteor definately not a plane im not sure because it happened so fast but it almost looked like a tail below the u shaped object
content.summary: I seen a u shaped object, florescent green with a white light inside it vanished in a split second
